item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 17, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Launching RDAP; sunsetting WHOIS (664 points | 271 comments)

3. HTTP/3 is everywhere but nowhere (150 points | 114 comments)
4. Docs – Open source alternative to Notion or Outline (1631 points | 422 comments)

10. The Alexa feature "do not send voice recordings" you enabled no longer available (672 points | 420 comments)
11. Nango (YC W23, Product Integrations Platform) Is Hiring Remote Engineers ( | hide)

21. When the Dotcom Bubble Burst (228 points | 231 comments)
22. Zlib-rs is faster than C (285 points | 381 comments)
23. Akira ransomware can be cracked with sixteen RTX 4090 GPUs in around ten hours (38 points | 10 comments)
24. Did the Particle Go Through the Two Slits, or Did the Wave Function? (181 points | 240 comments)
25. Artificial photosynthesis directed toward organic synthesis (53 points | 11 comments)
26. Teach, Don't Tell (2013) (179 points | 52 comments)
